description: 【[Chinese version] Updated on 2024.06.25, comprehensive display of kubernetes resources! Including K8S overall resource overview, microservice resource details, Pod resource details and K8S network bandwidth, and optimized display of important indicators. https://grafana.com/orgs/starsliao/dashboards
